SELECT SEQ_TRAVEL_COURSE_NO.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO TRAVEL_COURSE ( COURSE_NO, MEMBER_NO, COURSE_TITLE, THUMBNAIL_IMAGE, REGION_NAME, AREA_CODE, TOTAL_DAYS, REQUEST_TYPE, IS_SHARED, CREATED_DATE ) VALUES ( #{courseNo}, #{memberNo}, #{courseTitle}, #{thumbnailImage}, #{regionName}, #{areaCode}, #{totalDays}, #{requestType}, #{isShared}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT COURSE_NO, MEMBER_NO, COURSE_TITLE, THUMBNAIL_IMAGE, REGION_NAME, AREA_CODE, TOTAL_DAYS, REQUEST_TYPE, IS_SHARED, CREATED_DATE FROM TRAVEL_COURSE WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} ORDER BY CREATED_DATE DESC

SELECT tc.COURSE_NO, tc.MEMBER_NO, tc.COURSE_TITLE, tc.THUMBNAIL_IMAGE, tc.REGION_NAME, tc.AREA_CODE, tc.TOTAL_DAYS, tc.REQUEST_TYPE, tc.IS_SHARED, tc.CREATED_DATE, m.NICKNAME as MEMBER_NICKNAME FROM TRAVEL_COURSE tc JOIN MEMBER m ON tc.MEMBER_NO = m.MEMBER_NO WHERE tc.IS_SHARED = 'Y' ORDER BY tc.CREATED_DATE DESC
SELECT COURSE_NO, MEMBER_NO, COURSE_TITLE, THUMBNAIL_IMAGE, REGION_NAME, AREA_CODE, TOTAL_DAYS, REQUEST_TYPE, IS_SHARED, CREATED_DATE FROM TRAVEL_COURSE WHERE COURSE_NO = #{courseNo}

SELECT DETAIL_NO, COURSE_NO, DAY_NUMBER, VISIT_ORDER, PLACE_NAME, PLACE_ADDRESS, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE, PLACE_IMAGE, PLACE_TEL, PLACE_CATEGORY, CONTENT_ID, CONTENT_TYPE_ID FROM TRAVEL_COURSE_DETAIL WHERE COURSE_NO = #{courseNo} ORDER BY DAY_NUMBER, VISIT_ORDER
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TRAVEL_COURSE WHERE COURSE_NO = #{courseNo} AND MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
